title: How big is 800 square miles? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s 800 square miles, surely? What am I missing here? It is the area of a strip of land 1 mile wide and 800 miles long, or of a square roughly 28.28 miles on all sides. It is 207199 Hecatre, or 2071.99 Sq.Km, or 511999.9 acres. It is almost exactly one tenth the area of Wales, the traditional unit of measurement of newspaper stories. Or one 32nd the area of Tasmania,
